meanings.sent1: The bilobate leaf had two distinct sections.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the bilobate structure under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The bilobate cookie was accidentally split in half.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt bilobate, torn between two conflicting emotions.
meanings.sent5: The bilobate mountain peak stood out against the clear blue sky.

meanings.definition: Divided into two lobes or parts.
meanings.sent1: The bilobate fruit was easily recognizable by its split appearance.
meanings.sent2: The bilobate design of the building added an interesting architectural element.
meanings.sent3: The bilobate sandwich was cut perfectly in half.
meanings.sent4: The bilobate road diverged into two distinct paths.
meanings.sent5: The bilobate cloud in the sky resembled a pair of fluffy pillows.
